channel.title: Posts on EM's Tec Secret
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on EM's Tec Secret

item.title: 【Hugo】Using Notices
item.description: The "Notices" shortcode enables you to call out pieces of information - sidebars, warnings, tips, etc. To create a notice on a page, you can use the notice shortcode. You use the notice shortcode, with the first parameter being one of note, info, tip, and warning. Then add a title for your note in quotes as the second parameter. The inner body of the note can be whatever markdown you want to create.

item.title: 【Hugo】Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: 【Hugo】Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: 【Hugo】Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: 【Hugo】Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
